title: Minister of State for Digital
extract: In January 2018, Matthew Hancock, previous Minister of State for Digital, was appointed Secretary of State as part of the Cabinet Reshuffle. On 9 July 2018, Jeremy Wright became the Secretary of State for Digital, Media and Sport as part of the Cabinet Reshuffle.
extract_html: In January 2018, Matthew Hancock, previous Minister of State for Digital, was appointed Secretary of State as part of the Cabinet Reshuffle. On 9 July 2018, Jeremy Wright became the Secretary of State for Digital, Media and Sport as part of the Cabinet Reshuffle.
